TopicTitle: To the MUN and back with pleasure- MUNER 2.0 ;) (100% stock)

Articles.Content:
Hey, guys!

PS: I used a translator, when wrote this =>

I created this spacecraft for missions to the moon and returning back to Kerbin. My goal was to:

1) Make the lunar module in two steps (landing and take-off)

2) Carry out the possibility of hovering above the lunar surface (500-1000m) and horizontal maneuver in selecting the landing site

And I got this))) Most of the operations performed included ASAS, so management does not cause any problems. And the unit R.C.S. ONLY used for a horizontal landing maneuver.

This is a great ship, which copes with its mission) Enjoy and comment)
Nice little lander design. Looks very stable, and all with stock parts.
This is very nice, I barley missed the mun with this

This is very nice, I barley missed the mun with this

I have some troubles with translation 'barley missed the mun' )))

I have some troubles with translation 'barley missed the mun' )))
